scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/ ./test/spec/types && npm run lint && npm run generate-collection-types && npm run tsc && npm run compile-module-test
scripts.prettier-test:
echo 'ensuring prettier formatting...' && RESULT=$(npm run prettier > /dev/null && git diff-index --name-only HEAD --) && if [ -n "$RESULT" ]; then echo "Need to format:
$RESULT" && exit 1; else exit 0; fi
scripts.generate-collection-types: npm run compile-collections && mkdir -p test/spec/types &&  tyranid-tdgen -o './test/spec/types/isomorphic.d.ts' './dist/test/models/**/*.js' && tyranid-tdgen -o './test/spec/types/server.d.ts' -t server './dist/test/models/**/*.js'
